document_data.name: ''Glimmer of Hope''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Glimmer of Hope''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[mace]] associated with the [[Ilmatari]] faith.
document_data.Description: It was so named for the small [[diamond]] that was set into its point. On occasion the diamond radiated a bright light.
document_data.Powers:
The mace possessed a ''+2 enchantment'' and imbued its wielder with an improved sense of foresight and understanding.

On occasion, it filled the wielder and their allies with renewed ''[[bless|feelings of divine optimism]]''.
document_data.History:
The ''Glimmer of Hope'' was originally carried by a pacifist [[priest]] of Ilmater. He refused to wield the weapon in combat, a stance that cost him his life when he was slain by [[bandit]]s.

The priest's mace was found by his fellow clergymen and taken back to their temple. Upon examination they discovered the diamond which was not previously there.
